value: **THIS DO-FILE PREPARES THE DATA FROM THE KENYA GET AHEAD BUSINESS TRAINING PROGRAM IMPACT EVALUATION SURVEY FOR COMBINATION INTO THE MASTER DATASET
**The analysis was performed with Stata, version 14.2
* This do-file cannot be replicated as part of the underlying raw data needed to replicate this do-file is not (yet) publicly available.
*Firm has been assigned to business training
*Local to USD exchange rate at time of survey
*Survey took place between June 3, 2013 and November 1, 2013, so I take August 15, 2013 as approx. midpoint
*Hours worked in self-employment in last month
*based on hours worked  in last week
*based on hours worked  in a normal week
*Worked as wage worker in last month
*For  sec3_14_ business owners were asked to give the two main reasons for closure -> I only consider answers if they gave only one reason

if.value: "LANDLORD HIKED RENT THAT SHE COULD NOT AFFORD"
"MOTHER PASSED ON AND SHE WAS THE SOLE SPONSOR OF BUSINESS"
"USED BUSINESS MONEY TO PAY HOSPITAL BILLS FOR A SICK CHILD."
"CHILD WAS SICK AND COULD NOT RAISE MONEY FOR HOSPITAL BILL."
"SHE WENT TO NURSE HER SON WHO WAS ATTACKED BY DOGS"
"WAS PREGNANT, WENT FOR MATERNITY LEAVE AND ALSO DUE TO LANDLORDS CONDITIONS. "
"GAVE BIRTH AND HAD NOBODY TO LOOK AFTER HER BUSINESS."
"GAVE BIRTH AND IS STILL IN MARTERNITY LEAVE."
"SHE GAVE BIRTH AND IS STILL IN MARTERNITY LEAVE"
"WAS OVERWHELMED BY BUSINESS ACTIVITIES WITH  THE PREGNANCY"
"RELOCATED TO ANOTHER PLACE  THAT WAS VERY  FAR FROM THE  BUSINESS, COMMUTING BECOMES EXPENSIVE"
"HEALTH BILLS CONSUMED ALL THE BUSINESS MONEY"
"ALOT OF EXPENSES IN PAYING SCHOOL FEES FOR 2 OF MY CHILDREN"
"SHE WAS TOO TIRED TO LOOK FOR RAW MATERIALS DUE TO PREGNANCY"
"HER CHILD WAS SICK THUS SHE HAD TO CLOSE HER BUSINESS TO LOOK AFTER HER"
"I WAS OVERWHELMED BY MANY RESPONSIBILITIES BOTH AT HOME AND BUSINESS"
"THE SPOUSE WANTED HER TO TAKE CARE OF THE FAMILY INCLUDING LOOKING AFTER THEIR LIVESTOCK."
"THE FAMILY MEMBERS GOT SICK THEN SHE USED ALL THE MONEY CAPITAL  ON MEDICAL BILLS"
"CLOSED BUSINESS AFTER LOSING A RELATIVE WHO DIED IN NAIROBI AND WAS FORCED TO GO LIVE THE BERIEVED FAMILY FOR SOME TIME."
"WENT TO VISIT A FRIEND IN NAIROBI,AND GOT A WAGE WORK."
"THE BUSINESS PREMISE WAS BROUGHT DOWN BY THE COUNTY GOVERNMENT FOR ROAD RESERVE."
"THE BUSINESS WAS BROKEN INTO AND EVERYTHING WAS STOLEN"

value: *Since we are using data from 2 follow-up surveys, I seems that the cases which have newfirmstarted2==1 and survival2==1, survived to the first fu and then closed and opened a new one in the second fu, or closed and opened new firm in fu2 and then were coded as surviving in fu2, because this new business continued to be open
*Generate owner, household and business id (which are the same here)
